document.full_text: the first of five u.s. soldiers charged with killing unarmed afghan civilians in cold blood last year pleaded guilty on wednesday to three counts of premeditated murder and apologized in court, saying, "i lost my moral compass."
document.title: u.s. soldier pleads guilty to murdering afghans
